Title: Vengeance, Part 2
Writer: Chris Ryan (based on the book by), Tony Saint
Actors: Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Rhona Mitra, Rhashan Stone
Plot: Taken hostage in Mogadishu by Waabri and his girlfriend Asmara, Scott and Dalton escape with the help of Stonebridge and Richmond. Sinclair is replaced as leader of Section 20. Michael and Kerry rekindle their relationship.
